titleStmt.title: This coming to my hand, and reading it over, savouring it to come from a pure fountain, ...
How sin is strengthened, and how it is overcome.
titleStmt.author: Naylor, James, 1617?-1660.
S. B.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Simmons, at the Bull and Mouth neer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: Text has caption that reads: How sin is strengthened, and how it is overcome.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Harvard University Library.
